name: Lullaby for a Silhouette
description:
Lullaby for a Silhouette is a metroidvania where you play as Lila, a young girl whose village is attacked by vampires. She wakes up in the sewers as one of them, with only a cranky crow companion to keep her company as she struggles to navigate her new life as one of the dead.

Controls

Movement: WASD
Jump: Space
Attack: L
Dash: K

Credits

Luke Miller - Team Lead, Level Designer
Victor Zhou - Gameplay Designer, Programmer, Artist
Ryan MacWhorter - Producer
Henry Nguyen (Slim Shady) - MC Animator
Chase Taylor - Composer
Jennifer Siino - Writer, UI Artist
Daniel Gutierrez - Programming
Gavin Gnaster - Programming
Theo - Rat Art
